triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: CodePlan uses LLMs as the neural component to generate code edits at each step.

triples.name: Static program analysis
triples.relevance: The paper addresses fixing errors from static analysis tools as one of the repository-level coding activities.

triples.name: Type system
triples.relevance: Adding type annotations is mentioned as a key repository-level coding activity that CodePlan can perform.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: CodePlan frames repository-level coding as a planning problem using automated planning techniques.

triples.name: Neuro-symbolic AI
triples.relevance: CodePlan is explicitly described as a novel neuro-symbolic framework combining neural LLMs with symbolic components.

triples.name: Dependency graph
triples.relevance: CodePlan uses incremental dependency analysis as a symbolic component to understand code relationships.

triples.name: GitHub Copilot
triples.relevance: The paper compares CodePlan's repository-level approach against Copilot, which handles localized coding problems.
